sig_info: Whenever Spider-Ham Evades, he places a Porker Popper on the Opponent.
Whenever Spider-Ham is Struck while Stunned, 30% chance to remove 1 Spider-Nonsense and place a non-stacking Porker Popper on the Opponent.
These Porker Poppers last for 7 to 12 second(s) and deal 33.25 Damage.
While Spider-Nonsense is at 10, it lasts for an additional 0.2 to 1.3 second(s) before resetting.
